abstracts.cdata!:
The Siquirres - Limon Highway Project
            consists of the construction of a 57 km road link between
            Siquirres and Limon, including the construction of 19
            bridges, river defense works and about 150 drainage
            structures. The project also includes a feasibility study
            for the existing San Jose-Siquirres road, as this is in need
            of improvement and will reach capacity shortly after the
            Siquirres-Limon section has been built.
